text: == Events == * January or February – Emperor Theodosius I is baptized. * February 27 – Edict of Thessalonica: Theodosius I, with co-emperors Gratian and Valentinian II, say that all Roman citizens should become Christians. * The Rock of Cashel is built in Ireland. * The Visigothic chieftain Fritigern dies. His rival Athanaric becomes king of the entire Gothic nation. == Births == * Aelia Eudoxia, empress and wife of Arcadius * Alexius, Eastern saint * Eucherius, bishop of Lyon * Hephaistio of Thebes, Egyptian astrologer == Deaths == * Peter II, Patriarch of Alexandria * Samudragupta, ruler of the Gupta Empire * Wang Fahui, empress of the Jin Dynasty Category:380s
